§ 1701g–4. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Section, which placed restrictions on loans, was from the Independent Offices Appropriation Act, 1953, act July 5, 1952, ch. 578, title III, § 301, 66 Stat. 415, and was not repeated in subsequent appropriation acts.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Similar ProvisionsSimilar provisions were contained in Aug. 31, 1951, ch. 376, title IV, § 401, 65 Stat. 287.
